health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions were held regarding the need for a comprehensive database of all Epileptic Cases in the County and providing free Medical Services to such Patients.
health_data_challenges: Lack of accessible and affordable health care for low-income families affected by epilepsy.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Develop a comprehensive database of all Epileptic Cases in the County and provide free medical services to such patients.
health_evidence_base: Personal experiences and observations of the Members of the County Assembly.
health_evidence_requested: Data on epilepsy cases and the need for free medical services were requested from the Department of Health.
